title: QU4RTZ Live - Day 1!
detail_text: <:th_ch0206/>It’s almost time for our live concert~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m both nervous and excited. Rina-chan Board says, “Nerv-cited!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah! Look! You can peek inside the venue here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hehe, everyone looks like they can’t wait to see us perform~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>I also can’t wait to perform~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s almost time, so hang in there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin will lead the way and show everyone just how cute QU4RTZ is~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I wanna lead QU4RTZ, too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Me too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Why don’t we lead it together?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hey! Just leave it to Kasumin!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
